content: Sapevo che Tom era un insegnante di francese a Boston, quindi non credetti a Mary quando mi disse che era un tassista a Chicago.
translations: eng:I knew Tom was a French teacher in Boston, so I didn't believe Mary when she told me Tom was a taxi driver in Chicago
eng:I knew Tom was a French teacher in Boston, so I didn't believe Mary when she told me he was a taxi driver in Chicago
eng:I knew Tom was a French teacher in Boston, so I didn't believe Mary when she told me that Tom was a taxi driver in Chica
eng:I knew Tom was a French teacher in Boston, so I didn't believe Mary when she told me that he was a taxi driver in Chicag
eng:I knew that Tom was a French teacher in Boston, so I didn't believe Mary when she told me Tom was a taxi driver in Chica
eng:I knew that Tom was a French teacher in Boston, so I didn't believe Mary when she told me he was a taxi driver in Chicag

eng:I knew that Tom was a French teacher in Boston, so I didn't believe Mary when she told me that he was a taxi driver in C
